newslog.content: Mark Johnson has a tibia fracture and hes gonna be out of the play for 2 months.
Dominick R. Blink, a new Shooting Guard from San Francisco has joined the team!.
Christopher Grifin, a new Power Forward from Rockstar Bay College has joined the team!.
Thomas Durry has a composed hand fracture and he wont be playing untill September.
Jeremy Rittersen left the team after 2 year in the club and his new house are the Clovers.

desc.label: Team Bio:
desc.value: Based in California, and founded by Faye Spiegel The Game Huntress,  The Alchemists L.O. Heroes ended up being one of the strongests teams in the world.

newslog.content: James Girobillis knee fracture is healing properly and will be returning to the field next week.
James Girobilli has a knee fracture and hes gonna be out of the play for 4 months.
James Girobilli is now the 1st Shooting Guard after being 3rd Shooting Guard for the past year.
James Girobilli has an abductor strain so he will miss the next game against the LA Pirates.
James Girobilli has an abductor strain so he will miss the next game against the LA Pirates.
James Girobilli won the Player of the Year 2014 Award for the first time.
James Girobilli has a lower back contusion and will miss the next two games.
James Girobilli has joined the team after playing for the California Surfers for a year.

newslog.content: Jenny Thomps is now the new Team Recruiter for the East Coast Colleges.
Robert Frankson will have a surgery and will be out for a month. Interim coach will be Frank Roberts.
Max Stevens is now the 2nd Team Doctor after a succesfull run in the Sharks.
Tommy Flankers left the team after 2 years as the 2nd Team Doctor.
Patrick Storm is now the new Team Recruiter for the West Coast Colleges.
Alexa Polson is now the new Athletic Trainer after a succesfull run in the Pirates.
Savannah Lavender is the new Team Nutritionist with more than 500.000 followers.
Robert Frankson is now the new Alchemist Coach after a succesfull run in the Lucky Clovers.
